item.description:
Rhode Island Oath Keepers has been officially invited to participate in "The 65th Westerly Columbus Day Parade" this year!

This is an impressive event with many spectators and it will be televised. Please understand what an important outreach opportunity this is for us.

We made a great showing this year at the Memorial Day parade with a terrific float and 18 Rhode Island Oath Keepers marching and standing tall. I know that this one can be even bigger and better. So,what do you say? Who is ready to spend a terrific and exhilarating fall afternoon with friends spreading the good news message of "Oath Keepers"?

The Rhode Island Oath Keepers will be Unit: 8 in Division: 9 and will be staging at Narragansett Ave at 12:30 p.m. Sunday, October 7th. (Rain date October 8th)

We are still looking for more veterans to ride in a place of honor on the float like last time. (Preferably in uniform or Oath Keepers gear) also a drum, Fife or bagpipes would be nice, do you have any ideas?

Count off below: (Let's ROLL!)


We will be marching with:

American Legion Post 4
Ashaway Elementary School
B&M Landscaping, LLC
Battery C 1st RI Light Artillery
Battery D 705 AAA
Black Bear Traditional Martial Arts Center
Bradford Elementary School
Cottrell Brewing Company

Dancing Cop
Elks Club -- BPOE #6780
First Baptist Church
Independent Order of Odd Fellows
International Order of Rainbow Girls
John F. Kennedy Aircraft Carrier Project
Just Your Average Joe DJ and Party Service
Kathy Kent
Kiefers Martial Arts
Knights of Columbus #21
Korean War Veterans
Mary Adams
Milan Moscaritolo Antique Car
Misquamicut Business Assoc.
Misquamicut Fire Department
New England Historical Mounted Artillery
New Song Assembly of God
North Stonington Pair Queen, Princess and Junior Princess
Pawcatuck Fire District
Red Hat Ladies
RI Antique Tractor Club
Richmond Police Department
Side Hill Farm
South County Sea Devils Travel Softball Organization
St. Michael's School
Stonington Police Services/Color Guard
The American Mann and Little Uncle Sam
The Church at Westerly
The Rhode Island Oath Keepers
The Westerly Hospital
WESCON
Westerly Adult Day Care Center
Westerly Ambulance Corps
Westerly Cub Scouts Pack #10
Westerly Elks Lodge #678 BPOE
Westerly Fire Department

Westerly PeeWee Football

Westerly Relay for Life

Westerly Town Council Candidate
Westerly/Pawcatuck Area Cub Scouts
William D Peabody
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keepers Will March in "The 65th Westerly Columbus Day Parade"
